ConditionalActions.Instantly:
What the actual fuck? Greetings to all of you, humble people I think there is no need to introduce myself I am honored to have you here, but how exactly did you find us? Trade secret You took a contract recently Something about hitting a hospital if I remember correctly Well, your client was my agent, and he got detained And that fact really concerns me We are sorry to hear that, but we can offer our services to find the one who gave out your agent to the cops Oh, thank you guys But I am afraid I know already who it is To be precise , it is one of your operatives I would doubt that Oh really? What do you know about Vortex? He joined us recently and makes the job done. He proved himself a capable operative. Is there something we don't know?] Would it be a news to you that he is an undercover cop? He've done quite well on many of our missions, and they were successful, not including last one I wouldn't judge Jenkins so hard on his mistake Because there is no mistake at all What do you mean? Vortex notified a Police detective about your attack And hospital was ready for you, changed security protocols in a stealthy manner So nobody would suspect a little rat among you This changes everything Then I suppose I am packing my tools and going for a tet-a-tet with Vortex? No I have plans on him I think my plans are a little bit different from your's To lock you up in a cell for the rest of your life and clear my name His real name is Cypher Mendes Rings any bells? It is that cop, who fled CyberPolice after the FBI discovered his connections with drug cartel? Exactly Now he wants to bring justice to me and clear his name, because I set him up But I want to show him that there is always something you must sacrifise And so, I have a contract for NightHawks Kill Clara Gilmore, the detective of San-Francisco CyberPolice Department NO! DON'T YOU DARE TO DRAG HER IN Excuse me? But it is you who dragged her in that dangerous case and made her to dig under me She is a clever girl, but I am always one step ahead So I can provide her location to NightHawks right now I am ready, 125k for a detective job It is sold then! WAIT! What is it, Cypher? DON'T kill her, let it be me Self sacrifice? Hmm, I can respect that And after I am done with the Slayer, I will come to you It is our matter Don't involve anyone else Hmm... Ok, change of plans @channel I have a job to all of you We are going to hit an FBI Database and all of you would have an opportunity to wipe of all your personal data and start a new life But you need tools for that Luckily, Vortex knows an address of a Police Asset server But in case of his bad memory, I'll drop a link here !ATTACHMENT:link#%#Asset Server#%#90.91.183.142 @channel But as you can see, it is protected with advanced EnTech security protocols I have a special tool to break EnSec, but we can't breach whitelist yet I know a place where we can get what we need But to make it more interesting, Vortex will be leading this operation I will upload a .dll that helps to break EnSec to Vortex's PC, and then you can attack an archive of EnTech that contains whitelist breach tools Vortex can give that .dll to NightHawks, by uploading it in /home folder of this server, or he can unite with his girlfriend against me So, @Vortex, you have a pretty simple choice: upload .dll file to this server's /home folder if you want to unite with NightHawks, and I promise Clara won't be harmed and we would settle our matter
Alternatively, you can send it to Clara's Workstation's /home folder and unite with her. But I am warning you, NightHawks will attack you both, and you may not see me ever again You can't use this .dll youself, you need a partner who can make a valid .exe So... Choose wisely
